class.name: OpenXRPlaneTracker
class.brief_description: Spatial entity tracker for our spatial entity plane tracking extension.
class.description: Spatial entity tracker for our OpenXR spatial entity plane tracking extension. These trackers identify entities in our real space such as walls, floors, tables, etc. and map their location to our virtual space.

method.name: clear_mesh_data
method.description: Clears the mesh data for this tracker. You should only call this if you are handling your own discovery logic.

method.name: get_mesh
method.description: Gets a mesh created from either the mesh data or from our bounding size for this plane.

method.name: get_mesh_offset
method.description: Gets the transform by which to offset the mesh and collision shape from our pose to display these correctly.

method.name: get_shape
method.description: Gets a collision shape built either from the mesh data or from our bounding size for this plane.

method.name: set_mesh_data
method.description: Sets the mesh data for this plane. You should only call this if you are handling your own discovery logic.

members.member: The bounding size of the plane. This is a 2D size.
The main alignment in space of this plane.
The semantic label for this plane.

signal.name: mesh_changed
signal.description: Emitted when our mesh data has changed the mesh instance and collision needs to be updated.
